resources.string: Q1. What of the following is a logistic loop?

Q2. A manufacturer forecast a production of 200,000 cars the next four years. A supplier will supply two parts for every vehicle. If we assume it will take five days to the parts to move from the supplier to the plant and the safety stock to add five days more. How many pieces will be in the loop in any one moment?
How may box pallets 1200x1000x1000 mm fit in a truck 11,00x2,45x2,45mts ?
An empty pallet can be folded to 200 mm height. Looking at the previous question. How many empty palllet would fit now in the truck?
If the distance between the supplier and the plant is 2.000 km. What are the saving in transport cost because of folding during the 4 year life project span ?
